ppm_java.typelib

Class VAudioPort_Output

  • java.lang.Object
    • ppm_java.typelib.VBrowseable
      • ppm_java.typelib.VAudioObject
        • ppm_java.typelib.VAudioPort
          • ppm_java.typelib.VAudioPort_Output
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VAudioPort_Output_Chunks_NeedsBuffer, VAudioPort_Output_Chunks_NoBuffer, VAudioPort_Output_Samples

    public abstract class VAudioPort_Output
extends VAudioPort
    Base class for an output audio port. An output port is always associated with a hosting audio processor. It's connected with another VAudioPort_Input to where it sends its data. Every time this port sends data it will trigger a processing cycle in the audio processor associated with the connected input.
    Author:
    Peter Hoppe
